name: Do the evolution
description:
Do the evolution is the result of Team Trio Mid, the boys from Sapphire Devils, at a game jam, organised by Clujotronic, autumn 2019 with the theme being transforming life.

The game mechanics are quite simple, but enough hard to master: you have basically to jump your way to the top in order to evolve from a basic cell to the modern human. 

You have to jump, but you can't control the directions while being in air, you can choose the direction just while grounded. Also, the more you keep the space key pressed, the more you channel your jump, so you press more, you jump more.

Have fun, and if you send us a screenshoot with the end of the game, you will get the updated versions before we will release 'em! :-)
